docs.lead_paragraph: An early turkey day, whether “Fifty Shades of Grey” or a few movies starring the actual bird. Then Adele is on Saturday Night Live.

docs.lead_paragraph: A doctor raises concerns about plans for the first operation in the United States to transplant a uterus into a woman without one.
docs.snippet: A doctor raises concerns about plans for the first operation in the United States to transplant a uterus into a woman without one.

docs.lead_paragraph: Police are still trying to determine a motive for the killing, in which a baby was cut out of the pregnant victim.

headline.main: Pregnant Woman Killed in Stabbing in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Pregnant Woman Killed in Stabbing in the Bronx

docs.abstract: New York City police are trying to confirm that suspect in custody for stabbing death of 22-year-old Bronx woman is not in fact mother of newborn baby found at scene of crime; suspect claims baby is hers, despite fact that neighbors say victim was close to nine months pregnant; crime has shaken normally quiet Bronx neighborhood of Wakefield.
docs.snippet: Police are still trying to determine a motive for the killing, in which a baby was cut out of the pregnant victim.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and AL BAKER

docs.lead_paragraph: A 22-year-old pregnant woman was stabbed to death on Friday in a New York City apartment and investigators have a suspect into custody.

headline.main: Pregnant Woman Fatally Stabbed; Baby Survives Attack
headline.print_headline: Pregnant Woman Fatally Stabbed; Baby Survives Attack

headline.main: Mark Zuckerberg Plans 2-Month Paternity Leave From Facebook

docs.abstract: Family leave policies have become the subject of much discussion in the tech industry, and a number of top companies have increased the parental leave they offer.

headline.main: For Transgender Rights Opponents, Houston Wasn’t Enough

docs.abstract: Some of the same people who helped defeat the Houston Equal Rights Ordinance are trying the same tactics in Dallas.

docs.lead_paragraph: Portugal's Parliament has approved laws allowing same-sex couples to legally adopt children and permitting lesbians to obtain medically assisted fertilization.

docs.lead_paragraph: This is the new look of high school sex ed: A roomful of teens, 14-year-olds mostly, is told that a girl and boy meet at a school dance. The boy drives her home. They kiss. What happens next, over the girl's protests, leaves him confused and her crying, no longer a virgin.

headline.main: High School Sex Ed Teaching 'Yes Means Yes' Rape Prevention

docs.lead_paragraph: Americans are split over abortion restrictions like those in a Texas law challenged before the U.S. Supreme Court, reflecting deep and longstanding divisions over the contentious issue, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Wednesday.

headline.main: Americans Deeply Split on Abortion as Supreme Court Takes Case: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.print_headline: Americans Deeply Split on Abortion as Supreme Court Takes Case: Reuters/Ipsos Poll

docs.lead_paragraph: For thousands of childless couples the world over, India has been the go-to destination to fulfill their dreams of becoming parents, thanks to its well-trained doctors, well-appointed fertility clinics and vast numbers of poor women willing to serve as surrogate mothers.

headline.main: Indian Surrogates Feel Hurt by Gov't Ban on Foreign Clients
